Q_DESC:
You are given an array of n integers,a0,a1,...,an-1 , and a positive integer, k . Find and print the number of (i,j) pairs where ij and ai + aj is evenly divisible by k .
Input Format
The first line contains 2 space-separated integers, n and k, respectively. 
The second line contains n space-separated integers describing the respective values of a0,a1,...,an-1 .
Constraints
 2=n=100
 1=k=100
 1=ai=100
Output Format
Print the number of (i,j) pairs where ij and  ai + aj   is evenly divisible by k.
